mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reference to need for love and response. Reference to an incident at a fraternity party. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.
NEED SOMEBODY TO LOVE ← LOVE YOUR RIGHT HAND | My best friend was [illegible] at ∑ɸE RIP | Fuck them
